name: (S)-3-methyl-2-oxopentanoate:NAD+ 2-oxidoreductase (CoA-methylbutanoylating)
definition: (S)-3-Methyl-2-oxopentanoic acid + CoA + NAD+ <=> (S)-2-Methylbutanoyl-CoA + CO2 + NADH + H+
comment: multi-step reaction possibly identical to branched-chain alpha-keto acid dehydrogenase complex (see R04225+R03174+R07618)
